member.name: MFVideoSrcContentHintFlags
member.summary: Describes the intended aspect ratio for a video stream.

member.name: MFVideoSrcContentHintFlags.MFVideoSrcContentHintFlag_16x9
member.summary: The source is 16×9 content encoded within a 4×3 area.

member.name: MFVideoSrcContentHintFlags.MFVideoSrcContentHintFlag_235_1
member.summary: The source is 2.35:1 content encoded within a 16×9 or 4×3 area.
